assessments.status_rationale: Today’s headlines do not include a weekly initial jobless claims release or any reference to the 4-week moving average reaching ≥250,000. The deadline (2026-05-31) has not passed.

No BLS Employment Situation (unemployment rate) figure is reported in today’s bullets; one item notes an upcoming key jobs report but provides no unemployment rate value. The relevant reference months (2026-02 to 2026-05) are only beginning and the publication deadline (2026-06-30) is in the future.
There is no news of the U.S. Senate passing a standalone crypto market-structure bill assigning the CFTC primary oversight for spot digital commodity markets. Deadline (2026-06-30) has not passed.

Today’s bullets contain no Conduent SEC filing/press release/breach notice update about the number of affected individuals, so there is no evidence for or against the ≥10,000,000 threshold. Deadline (2026-04-30) has not passed.
No reporting here indicates Substack has rolled out mandatory 2FA for all creator accounts. Deadline (2026-06-30) has not passed.

None of today’s items mention an EU/UK procurement or financing package (≥€100M/≥£85M) for Ukraine satellite terminals/services that explicitly names Starlink or Starshield. Deadline (2026-09-30) has not passed.
There is no indication in today’s bullets of a new ClinicalTrials.gov listing for a Phase 1 (or Phase 1/2) intranasal H5N1 influenza vaccine trial. Deadline (2026-12-31) has not passed.

Today’s news includes U.S.-Iran nuclear talks coverage but does not report a State Department appointment/designation of a senior envoy or lead negotiator for nuclear arms control/strategic stability. Deadline (2026-12-31) has not passed.
